results.title: Thermosensitive chitosan/poly(N-isopropyl acrylamide) nanoparticles embedded in aniline pentamer/silk fibroin/polyacrylamide as an electroactive injectable hydrogel for healing critical-sized calvarial bone defect in aging rat model.
results.text_hl: Implantation of the hydrogels containing both @<m>CHEMICAL_simvastatin_acid</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C063287 @@@simvastatin acid@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ascorbic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001205 @@@vitamin C@@@ into the critical calvarial @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone defect@@@ of the aged @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ also demonstrated significant enhancement of bone healing after 4 and 8 weeks post-implantation.

citations.NLM: Zarrin NK, Mottaghitalab F, Reis RL, Kundu SC, Farokhi M. Thermosensitive chitosan/poly(N-isopropyl acrylamide) nanoparticles embedded in aniline pentamer/silk fibroin/polyacrylamide as an electroactive injectable hydrogel for healing critical-sized calvarial bone defect in aging rat model. Int J Biol Macromol. 2022 Jul 31;213():352-368. PMID: 35640849
